articles.description: Holy Cross has a date with Iowa and Caitlin Clark. The Crusaders defeated UT Martin 72-45 in a wire-to-wire victory in the First Four on Thursday.
articles.content:
Editor's note: Follow all the women's March Madness scores, updates, highlights and upsets with USA TODAY Sports' live coverage.
Holy Cross has a date with Iowa and Caitlin Clark.
